document_data.name: Pleaders' Consortium
document_data.mainbody: The '''Pleaders' Consortium''' was the guildhall for the professional advocates in the city of [[Daggerford]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite interactive atlas}}
document_data.Location: The guildhall was located near central Daggerford along [[Water Street]] just south of the [[Trade Way (Daggerford)|Trade Way]].
